author: bridge-bot
content:
<Highlander1969> HI everyone, for those interested the Ethereum - OASIS (new name) L2 Standards WG will meet tomorrow (May 15) at 7 am PST/10 am EST/14:00 UTC /15:00 CET/11 pm JSTÂ 

Agenda
 1. Welcome, and a reminder of the WG meeting rule
2.  Selection of scribe
3. Introduction of new participants
4. Finalize new article (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1oLEZVaTSDMVTjMbB2rbbLXRZOQP81_hY_82UpjDGBdY/edit?usp=drivesdk)
5. Collect Apprivals for L2 Transaction Fee API spec PR (PR#53 -- https://github.com/eea-oasis/L2/pull/53)
6. Review Open Issues
7. Open Forum for other items

This is the zoom link: https://us02web.zoom.us/j/81599021689?pwd=VmxPVUNCVmE5RkkweGY1YmN1OWMrZz09
